name: refreshArchivalLocationDataSources
description: Update the current Rubrik CDM cluster with information about the changes made to a list of data sources in an archival location by the Rubrik CDM cluster that owns the archival location.

location_id.description: ID assigned to an archival location object.

body.description: A set of local and archival IDs for data sources to refresh. For a data source, either a local or archival data source ID should be specified. The operation will fail if `none` is specified.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
